text:
@SenSchumer First —any covid-19 bills should have ONLY covid related items - NOT corrupt democrat PORK.
To protect our elections, we need:
1) Voter ID
2) Paper ballots 
3) Voting in person
4) Analog (not electronic) counting of ballots.
5) NO mail-in ballots or ballot harvesting.
